name: Night Scorpion
movement: walks at a speed of 40 feet
description: A large scorpion with powerful claws and a venomous sting, able to grapple foes.
memorable: Its ability to inflict paralysis and blindness through its poisonous sting makes the Night Scorpion a formidable adversary.
goals: Typically hunts for prey using stealth and surprise tactics.
relations: Often encountered in desert or arid environments, it may share habitat with other predatory beasts.
environment: Commonly found in deserts and arid terrains.
strengths: Possesses a Multiattack capability with both grappling and poisonous effects.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma hinder its social interactions and strategic planning.
attacks: Can execute two claw attacks to grapple and a sting attack causing piercing and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: The sting attack can blind and potentially paralyze targets, significantly hindering their combat effectiveness.
senses: Has blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to sense its surroundings without relying on sight.
skills: It has no notable skill proficiencies.
additional_information: Low intelligence makes it less strategic in combat.
Grapples opponents to restrict their movement.
Poisons targets with additional damage and effects.
Can cause blindness for an hour with its sting.

large creature with grappling and poison attacks
